events.name: West Ham United at Leicester City

headlines.description: Leicester City bounced back from Sunday's defeat at Southampton to beat West Ham United 4-1 at the King Power Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy injury blow as Leicester thrash West Ham

headlines.description: Dele Alli and Son Heung-Min scored as Tottenham Hotspur grabbed a 2-1 win over cellar dwellers Norwich City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alli, Son score as Tottenham edge past Norwich

headlines.description: Manchester suffered a second consecutive defeat in the Premier League after losing 2-0 to Burnley at Old Trafford on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Woeful Man United humbled at home by Burnley
